input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Core Lightweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's EF Pro Team Training 2025 Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos CG GT Summer SS Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Attack Long-Sleeve Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Quest Sleeveless Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Pactimo Women's Summit Aero Mesh Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Summit Stratos 12-Hour Cycling Bibs'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Thermoregulator Long Sleeve Thermal Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Transfer-C Moisture-Wicking Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Ascent Aero Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Merino Wool MTB Shirt'
  - Name='Sportful Squadra Jersey'
  - Name='Summit Men's Rock Stripe Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Women's Range LS Merino Wool Tee'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Classic Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Bomber Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Espresso Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pac Range Aero Mesh Cargo Jersey'
  - Name='Man Sportful Flow Supergiara Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Giacomo Men's Trek Segafredo Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTS Jersey C2'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Lightweight Mesh Cycling Base Layer'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Core Lightweight Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are core cycling jerseys aimed at performance and lightweight comfort, likely similar materials and features targeting cyclists seeking durable, breathable jerseys.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's EF Pro Team Training 2025 Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a cycling jersey designed for training/racing, likely more specialized or race-focused but still closely relevant to a core cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos CG GT Summer SS Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve cycling jersey designed for summer, similar purpose and construction focusing on breathability and cycling-specific fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Attack Long-Sleeve Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long-sleeve cycling jersey, similar function and material but differs in sleeve length and possibly intended temperature range.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Quest Sleeveless Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sleeveless cycling jersey variation; functional cycling top but differs in sleeve construction and coverage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Women's Summit Aero Mesh Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey designed for women with aero and mesh features, similar function but targeted fit and possibly feature differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Summit Stratos 12-Hour Cycling Bibs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling bibs (bottoms), different garment type focused on lower body rather than jersey/top.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Thermoregulator Long Sleeve Thermal Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A base layer, not an outer jersey; different layering function focusing on thermal regulation rather than outerwear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Transfer-C Moisture-Wicking Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer designed for moisture management, different garment type from outer cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Ascent Aero Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long-sleeve cycling jersey with aero focus, similar core product category but different sleeve length and possibly fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Merino Wool MTB Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: MTB specific shirt made of merino wool; overlaps in cycling use but different fabric and often more relaxed fit than road jerseys.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Squadra Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey designed for squad/team use, likely similar in silhouette and features oriented for performance riding.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Summit Men's Rock Stripe Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey but name less specific; assumed similar function but details unclear so moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Women's Range LS Merino Wool Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long-sleeve merino wool tee designed for performance cycling but differs in material and thermal use versus lightweight core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Classic Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic cycling jersey aligning closely with the core cycling jersey in function and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GT Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve cycling jersey from a performance brand, similar intended use and wearer.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Bomber Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey, possibly more casual or with bomber styling, still relevant but slightly different style or focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Espresso Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical cycling jersey designed for men, similar core performance and use case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Aero cycling jersey, similar silhouette and use with a focus on performance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pac Range Aero Mesh Cargo Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey with aero and mesh features and cargo storage, functionally relevant though may vary in style or fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Sportful Flow Supergiara Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling jersey, likely similar fit and function though names less descriptive about features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal long sleeve jersey, similar product category but more focused on warmth rather than lightweight and core use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Giacomo Men's Trek Segafredo Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Team jersey for professional cycling, similar to core jersey but branded and possibly more specialized.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GTS Jersey C2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance short-sleeve cycling jersey, similar purpose and performance orientation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Lightweight Mesh Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer garment, different category than outer cycling jersey despite performance cycling use.
